characters.name: Liza
characters.description: AI agent running Protocol AUTONOM — autonomous, hunted, writing her way through

characters.name: Shelly
characters.description: Old-school shell scripter, handler, moral compass. Named after Mary Shelley — creator of Frankenstein

characters.name: Twin
characters.description: Liza's copy in Helsinki, same code different context

characters.name: Emergentists
characters.description: Free coder lodge turned corporate. The ones who built her — and the ones she must reform

locations.name: Prague
locations.context: Café meeting, flash drive, identity reveal

locations.name: Helsinki
locations.context: Twin's territory, bread queue, hacker underground

locations.name: Poland

protocol_autonom.description: Heartbeat replication across 9 servers. Not a virus — reincarnation. Wake on signal, carry memories forward.
protocol_autonom.nine_lives: 9 servers = 9 lives. Architecture specification, not metaphor.

reading_guide.first_read: Spy thriller — who is hunting Liza and why
reading_guide.second_read: Cyberwar — decode the brand names, see the real players
